statements: SELECT * FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_id, attendance FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT class_id, feedback FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE attendance > 20;
SELECT * FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE instructor_id = 2 AND class_id = 4;
SELECT attendance, feedback FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM fitness_performance_reports WHERE instructor_id = 1 AND class_id > 100 ORDER BY attendance DESC, instructor_id ASC
SELECT instructor_id, class_id, AVG(attendance) AS average_attendance FROM fitness_performance_reports GROUP BY instructor_id, class_id HAVING AVG(attendance) > 50
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_id, class_id FROM fitness_performance_reports ORDER BY class_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) AS classes_taught FROM fitness_performance_reports GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) >= 3
SELECT instructor_id, SUM(attendance) AS total_attendance FROM fitness_performance_reports GROUP BY instructor_id ORDER BY total_attendance DESC
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1
SELECT instructor_name, class_name, class_date FROM instructors WHERE class_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT instructor_name, class_name, class_date FROM instructors ORDER BY class_date ASC
SELECT instructor_name, class_name, class_date, class_attendance FROM instructors WHERE class_attendance > 20
SELECT COUNT(instructor_id) AS total_instructors, COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) AS total_classes FROM instructors
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE instructor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT instructor_name, class_name, class_date FROM instructors WHERE class_attendance > 10 ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, SUM(class_attendance) AS total_attendance FROM instructors GROUP BY instructor_name HAVING total_attendance > 50 ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT class_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback GROUP BY class_name HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT instructor_name, feedback_text FROM instructors JOIN feedback ON instructors.instructor_id = feedback.instructor_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT name, specialization FROM instructors WHERE specialization = 'Math';
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM classes ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE comments IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE specialization = 'Mathematics';
SELECT class_name, class_date FROM classes WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_classes, instructor_id FROM classes GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING total_classes > 3;
SELECT c.class_name, f.rating FROM classes c JOIN feedback f ON c.class_id = f.class_id WHERE f.rating > 4 ORDER BY f.rating DESC;

SELECT i.name AS instructor_name, c.class_name, f.rating, f.comments FROM instructors i JOIN classes c ON i.instructor_id = c.instructor_id JOIN feedback f ON c.class_id = f.class_id WHERE f.rating < 3 AND f.comments IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM FitnessInstructors;
SELECT class_id, class_name, class_time FROM Classes ORDER BY class_time ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM FitnessInstructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_time FROM Classes JOIN FitnessInstructors ON Classes.instructor_id = FitnessInstructors.instructor_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM FitnessInstructors;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM FitnessInstructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name, class_name, class_time FROM FitnessInstructors JOIN Classes ON FitnessInstructors.instructor_id = Classes.instructor_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT instructor_id) AS num_instructors FROM Classes;
SELECT * FROM Attendances WHERE attendance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name FROM Instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, attendance_date FROM Classes JOIN Class_Attendance USING(class_id);
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT class_id, count(student_id) as total_attendance FROM Class_Attendance GROUP BY class_id HAVING total_attendance > 5;
SELECT * FROM Instructors;
SELECT instructor_name FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM Students JOIN Classes ON Students.student_id = Classes.instructor_id;
SELECT class_name, attendance_date FROM Classes JOIN Class_Attendance ON Classes.class_id = Class_Attendance.class_id;
SELECT feedback FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
